text: Ani jara amhi icchile asate tara tyala ya nisanyammule ucca padavara basavile asate, parantu to tara jagacya mohapasata adakala ani apalya iccha-akanksancya mage calu lagala tevha tyaci avastha kutryasarakhi jhali ki jara tumhi tyacyavara halla karala tarihi (jibha bahera kadhuna) dhapa takila kinva tyala soduna dyala tarihi dhapa takila. Hica avastha'a tya lokanci ahe, jyanni amacya ayatinna khote tharavile, yastava tumhi ya avasthece nivedana kara, kadacita tya lokanni kahi vicara karava
